column4: maybe my question was a little bit too specific... but really i was wondering if there is anyway at all to help test my emulated middle button for the mouse
Open up a text editor. Highlight some text, and then press your left and right mouse buttons together into the text editor. It should paste what you've highlighted.
wow excellent, works like a charm. Now I have to try figure out why KDVI is not reading my 'middle button' inputs
